author: Will Knight
title: Sam Altman’s Sudden Exit Sends Shockwaves Through OpenAI and Beyond
description: Microsoft’s Satya Nadella reportedly “furious” following Altman's dramatic departure from OpenAI Friday. Meanwhile, OpenAI’s president and three senior researchers have resigned.
content: Earlier this month, Altman hosted OpenAIs first developer conference and announced a plan to create an app store for AI agents built on top of its technology. Altman was also courting Middle East sov… [+2644 chars]
